path: artifacts/Community Token Full Smart Contract Security Audit.pdf

project_path.CommunityToken: contracts/Community Token Full Smart Contract Security Audit/CommunityToken

findings.title: Out of gas
findings.description: The function `includeInReward()` uses a loop to find and remove addresses from the `_excluded` list, which can cause an OUT_OF_GAS exception if the excluded addresses list is too long. Similarly, the `_getCurrentSupply` function also uses a loop that can be aborted with an OUT_OF_GAS exception.
